parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the Applications page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. You can obtain the ID on the Tasks page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespaces page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: VersionDescription
parameters.description: The description of the script version.
